channel.title: Posts on Noteworthy
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Noteworthy

item.title: Kivy - how to handle single and double touch events
item.description: Intro Kivy is a python library to make cross platform applications.

item.title: Use JIRA API with SAS to retrieve tickets
item.description: Walkthrough on how to leverage the JIRA Rest API with SAS to retrieve JIRA tickets

item.title: Pandas dataframe from S3 data using boto3 or smart_open
item.description: Walkthrough on how to create a Pandas dataframe from data stored in Amazon S3 data using boto3 or smart_open library.

item.title: 1NF, 2NF, and 3NF Normalization
item.description: Database normalization is a crucial step in designing database systems.

item.title: Create an Apache Spark standalone cluster
item.description: This tutorial covers how to set up a standalone spark cluster on your local machine and submit a spark job to your cluster
